properties.headline: High Surf Advisory issued February 8 at 2:34AM PST until February 8 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT....Large waves and hazardous surf conditions expected.
Breakers up to 23 feet.

* WHERE...South Washington Coast.

* WHEN...Until 7 PM PST Saturday evening.

* IMPACTS...A High Surf Advisory means that high surf will affect
beaches in the advisory area, producing rip currents and
localized beach erosion.

Exercise extreme caution along beaches. Unpredictable and
destructive waves may wash over beaches, jetties and other
structures with no warning. beach erosion is possible. This is
not a time to be near the water.
properties.instruction:
A High Surf Advisory means that high surf will affect beaches in
the advisory area, producing rip currents and localized beach
erosion.

NWSheadline: HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST SATURDAY EVENING
